page.title: 13Woodhouse Hotel,Princethorpe
page.content: The Woodhouse Hotel is situated on the Princethorpe Road,it has been an hotel for forty years.The hotel has twenty- two rooms,singles or double rooms,with or without a bathroom.Every room has a colour telivision and is uniquely decorated.There are forty-two staff, including Mr Grundy who is the owner and chef.The hotel allows pets but not in the kitchen.There is not a night club but they play records on a Saturday night.They do bed and breakfast and have a bar.The hotel has a garden,an outdoor swimming pool used by club members and families,and facilities for children,an adventure playground i.e. swings etc.There are also tennis courts for club members. The hotel rates two star because there is not a lift or a telephone in every room.
